Name: mal-cheriyamundamab-la
Author: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed And Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor

Translations.Text: niyum ninre kuteyullavaril oru vibhagavum ratriyute mikkavarum munnil rantu bhagavum (cilappeal) pakutiyum (cilappeal) munnileannum ninnu namaskarikkunnunt enn tirccayayum ninre raksitavinnariyam. allahuvan ratriyeyum pakalineyum kanakkakkunnat‌. ninnalkk at kliptappetuttanavukayillenn avannariyam. atinal avan ninnalkk ilav ceytirikkunnu. akayal ninnal khur'anil ninn sekaryappettat otikkeant namaskarikkuka. ninnalute kuttattil reagikalum bhumiyil sancaricc allahuvinre anugraham tetikkeantirikkunna vere cilarum allahuvinre margattil yud'dham ceyyunna marr cilarum untakum enn allahuvinnariyam. atinal atil (khur'anil) ninn sekaryappettat ninnal parayanam ceytu keallukayum namaskaram muraprakaram nirvahikkukayum sakatt nalkukayum allahuvinn uttamamaya katam nalkukayum ceyyuka. svadehannalkk venti ninnal entearu nanma munkutti ceyt vekkukayanenkilum allahuvinkal at gunakaravum erravum mahattaya pratiphalamullatumayi ninnal kantettunnatan‌. ninnal allahuveat papameacanam tetukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum allahu ere pearukkunnavanum karunanidhiyumakunnu
kututal nettam keaticcu keant ni audaryam ceyyarut‌
ninre raksitavinu venti ni ksama kaikkealluka
enneyum nan ekanayikkeant srsticca oruttaneyum vittekkuka
avann nan samrd'dhamaya sampatt untakki keatukkukayum ceytu
avannu nan nalla sekaryannal ceytu keatukkukayum ceytu
pinneyum nan kututal keatukkanamenn avan meahikkunnu
alla, tirccayayum avan nam'mute drstantannaleat matsaryam kanikkunnavanayirikkunnu
prayasamulla oru kayarram kayaran nam valiye avane nirbandhikkunnatan‌
